name: 1945-shooter
description:
1945-2  UPDATE!

NEW LEVEL AND PLANE ADDED!

This is a simple scrolling shooter game. You control an airplane flying over the sea that is attacked by enemy plane. Try to survive and shoot as many enemy planes as you can in the process.

Controls

use the arrow keys to control the plane
use the bar to fire
use to quit the game

Game programming by Shankha Chaki
Game artwork created by Shankha Chaki  shankhachaki08@gmail.com
